claim_process_steps.title: Report Loss Immediately
claim_process_steps.description: Notify crop loss within 72 hours of occurrence.
claim_process_steps.details: Submit evidence such as geo-tagged photos or videos to support your claim.

claim_process_steps.title: Contact Insurance Company
claim_process_steps.description: Inform your insurance agent or visit the branch office.
claim_process_steps.details: Provide accurate land and crop details relevant to the insured crop.

claim_process_steps.title: Field Verification
claim_process_steps.description: Joint survey conducted by insurance company and government officials.
claim_process_steps.details: Cooperate with the survey team and provide all necessary farming records or documents.

claim_process_steps.title: Loss Assessment
claim_process_steps.description: Insurance company evaluates the extent of the crop loss.
claim_process_steps.details: Wait for completion of assessment report that determines the compensation amount.

claim_process_steps.title: Claim Approval
claim_process_steps.description: Insurance company processes and approves the claim based on the assessment.
claim_process_steps.details: Approved claim is queued for payment processing.

claim_process_steps.title: DBT Transfer
claim_process_steps.description: Approved claim amount is directly credited to the farmerâ€™s bank account.
claim_process_steps.details: Payment is made through Direct Benefit Transfer (DBT); check your bank account for confirmation.
